this_title: Streif: One Hell of a Ride
trans_title: 史特莱夫：一个地狱的旅程
introduction: Now celebrating its 75th anniversary, the annual Hahnenkamm race in Kitzbühel, Austria, has produced unforgettable triumphs and heartrending tragedies, a heritage that is full of myths and legends. Nowhere else is skiing celebrated so intensely. The city, the nation, and the entire winter sports world go crazy for the battles that play out on the slopes, and the race down the S...
chinese_title: 史特莱夫：一个地狱的旅程
foreign_title: Streif: One Hell of a Ride
